name: Saint Francis of Assisi
lifeSummary: Saint Francis of Assisi was an Italian Catholic friar, deacon, and preacher. He founded the men's Order of Friars Minor, the women's Order of Saint Clare, and the Third Order of Saint Francis.
quotes: Preach the Gospel at all times. When necessary, use words.
For it is in giving that we receive.

prayers.name: Prayer for Peace
prayers.details: Lord, make me an instrument of Your peace; where there is hatred, let me sow love; where there is injury, pardon; where there is doubt, faith.

name: Saint Teresa of Calcutta
lifeSummary: Saint Teresa of Calcutta, known as Mother Teresa, was a nun and missionary known for her charitable work with the poor in India.
quotes: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.
If you judge people, you have no time to love them.

prayers.name: Prayer for the Poor
prayers.details: Lord, help us to see Your face in every person who is poor and to respond to their needs with love.

name: Saint John Paul II
lifeSummary: Saint John Paul II was the pope from 1978 to 2005, and is known for his contributions to theology and his travels around the world.
quotes: Do not be afraid. Open wide the doors to Christ.
The future starts today, not tomorrow.

prayers.name: Prayer to the Holy Spirit
prayers.details: Come, Holy Spirit, fill the hearts of Your faithful and kindle in them the fire of Your love.

name: Saint Therese of Lisieux
lifeSummary: Saint Therese of Lisieux, also known as the Little Flower, was a Carmelite nun known for her 'little way' of loving God.
quotes: I will spend my heaven doing good on earth.
Let us love, since that is what our hearts were made for.

prayers.name: Prayer to Saint Therese
prayers.details: Saint Therese, teach us to follow your 'little way' of trust and love.

name: Saint Augustine of Hippo
lifeSummary: Saint Augustine of Hippo was a theologian and philosopher, known for his influential works in Christian doctrine, including 'Confessions' and 'The City of God'.
quotes: You have made us for yourself, O Lord, and our hearts are restless until they rest in you.
Faith is to believe what you do not see; the reward of this faith is to see what you believe.

prayers.name: Prayer to Know God
prayers.details: O God, let me know myself; let me know You, so that I may love You.
